mapper.select: SELECT m.seq as 'seq' , CASE WHEN m.email IS NOT NULL THEN m.email ELSE '' END as 'email' , m.username as 'username' , m.pwd as 'pwd' , a.authority_code as 'authorityCode' , CASE WHEN m.oauth_key IS NOT NULL THEN m.oauth_key ELSE '' END as 'oauthKey' , CASE WHEN m.picture IS NOT NULL THEN m.picture ELSE '' END as 'picture' FROM member m LEFT JOIN member_authority a ON a.member_id = m.seq WHERE m.email = #{email} or m.oauth_key = #{oauthKey}
